action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a pixelated representation of what appears to be a collection of Tetris blocks in various colors. There is a purple cross-shaped block at the top left, followed by a horizontal line of green blocks that steps down in a zigzag pattern. Below the green blocks, there is an orange zigzag pattern that mirrors the green one above it. To the right, there is a pink block with a small square hole near the top, and below it, a pink T-shaped block. The background is white, and the overall image has a very simplistic, game-like aesthetic.
continue

The shapes are arranged against a white background and do not touch each other. They resemble the classic Tetris game pieces but are not arranged in a typical gameplay layout.
